oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Walker, Greene - Letter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Civil War; military; correspondence;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Maj. J. A. Walker, Dardenelle, AR, to Col. Colton Greene: sending reply to Greene's note of 8/30; informs that Capt. Hooper never claimed to act for Greene in the matter of turning the mules over to the government and that, to Walker's knowledge, Greene never held any conversation on the matter.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
